PositionHistory.Title: Student Placement Cell
PositionHistory.Description: Student Placement Cell • Established healthy relationship with recruiters; organised smooth placement sessions (Apr'14 - Till date) • Invited 1000+ companies; department internships status - 76% (second highest) Captain • Scheduled practice sessions, conducted trials & mentored a team of 13 members Table Tennis Team • Led a team of 7 in Inter-IIT Sports Meet, Guwahati & Mumbai (won Gold)

PositionHistory.Title: Head - Finance
PositionHistory.Description: (Feb'13 - Till date) • Managed budget of 1.08 lakh (team budget) and 4 lakh (Inter IIT budget) Head - Finance • Supervised budget division of 10 lakh for inter college sports festival Varchas'14 • Analysed pre-fest cost for 15 departments; reserved 0.5+ lakh for Varchas'15

PositionHistory.Title: Marketing Coordinator
PositionHistory.Description: (Sep'13 - Apr'14) • Employed 3.32 lakh on marathon for social cause - Run for Democracy; footfall - 900 Marketing Coordinator • Instituted a 4 tier team of 35+ students to organize one of the largest festival of state PROM • Introduced client specific-marketing modules by customization of events
(Jul'12 - Apr'13) • Garnered a total sponsorship of 30.2 lakh; 168 % of growth in funds generated EXTRA-CURRICULARS

Degree.Comments: B.Tech, System Science Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur 7.49/10 2011-pursuing
Class XII, CBSE Sir Padampat Singhania School, Kota 80.0% 2011
Class X, CBSE Aditya Birla Public School, Bharuch 94.4% 2009

Competency.name: COMPREHENSIVE LARGE ARRAY DATA STEWARDSHIP SYSTEM

CompetencyEvidence.name: COMPREHENSIVE LARGE ARRAY DATA STEWARDSHIP SYSTEM
CompetencyEvidence.typeDescription: Found in EDUCATION; PERSONAL INTERESTS AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS; DEG-2; DEG-3

Achievement.Description: KVPY Scholar'11 • Awarded scholarship by Department of Science and Technology, Government of India
Merit Scholarship - Class X • Conferred with scholarship for meritorious performance by Reliance Industries Limited
Cultural • Won 1st prize in SHOUT (extempore) in Spandan'11 and in Group Dance in Spandan'12

IIT JEE'11 • Ranked in top 0.5% of 5, 00, 000 students appearing for IIT JEE'11 KVPY Scholar'11 • Awarded scholarship by Department of Science and Technology, Government of India NTSE'08 • Secured rank in top 2000 among 2, 50, 000 students; by NCERT, Government of India Merit Scholarship - Class X • Conferred with scholarship for meritorious performance by Reliance Industries Limited INTERNSHIPS Developing Models for Attribute Analysis of Asset Liability Management Desk Kotak Mahindra Bank • Attributed (factor analysis) Treasury - P&L into 8 major factors/reasons; used MS Excel Limited • Applied quantitative and qualitative methodologies on monthly basis P&L for past 5 years (May'14 - Jul'14) • Employed linear programming techniques for portfolio optimisation Power Plant - System Study - Its Maintenance & Operation Reliance Industries • Proposed addition of CPU (Condensate Pre-heating Unit) in flue path after economiser Limited • Increased efficiency of HRSG (Heat Recovery Steam Generator) by 1.5 - 2% (May'13 - Jul'13) • Designed ways to tackle real life problems in setting up new project "Captive Power Plant"
PROJECTS Portfolio Modeling with • Studying nature of data sets; checking linearity and lag relations; filtering outliers Robustness in Forecasting • Forecasting stock prices of competitors by pattern observation and regression models & Optimization • Improving forecast results by Hidden Markov Model to build dynamic portfolio (On Going) • Applying learning algorithms and linear/non-linear optimization tools on portfolio Assembly Line Scheduling • Formulated an optimised method to minimize time and cost in assembly line (Jul'13 - Dec'13) • Implemented dynamic programming in C language Dynamical Billiards Study • Analyzed and computed billiard system for different parameters on MATLAB (Aug'13 - Nov'13) • Examined sensitivity dependence on initial conditions, periodic orbits and chaos Prime No. Generation • Developed methods for generating new prime numbers from given finite set of prime (Aug'13 - Nov'13) numbers and checked efficiency on Python; Open problem

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Rishabh Jain's experience appears to be concentrated in Information Technology / Big Data, with exposure to Finance / Other. Rishabh Jain's experience appears to be LOWER-TO-MID LEVEL, with about 3 years of experience, with no management experience.

sov:Hobbies.sov:Text:
• Secured 1st position in 3 intra college chess tournaments; played chess at State Level Social • Organised Jodhpur's 1st Marathon to support women empowerment; core team member Cultural • Won 1st prize in SHOUT (extempore) in Spandan'11 and in Group Dance in Spandan'12
• Puzzle solving, swimming, playing strategy games Address: Room No. 105, Type I, IIT Jodhpur Hostels, Jodhpur, Rajasthan - 342005
